title: Aragorn, King in Exile (1P365)
text:
Set:	The Fellowship of the Ring
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Gondor
Twilight:	4
Card Type:	Companion • Man
Strength:	8
Vitality:	4
Resistance:	6
Signet:	Aragorn
Game Text:	Ranger. At the start of each of your turns, you may heal another companion who has the Aragorn signet.
Lore:	”'He turned from that path a long time ago. He has chosen exile….'”
Rarity:	P
